altTitles.en: Four Dangerous Brothers to My Rescue!

altTitles.th: เหล่าพี่ชายสุดอันตรายของคุณหนู

altTitles.ja: 公女様の危ないお兄ちゃんたち

altTitles.vi: Anh Trai Nguy Hiểm Của Tôi

altTitles.id: Para Kakak Putri Duke yang Berbahaya

description.en:
Lestia, who grew up in the slums with her drunken uncle and managed to make ends meet by selling flowers. One night when her uncle, who was threatened by some thugs because of his debt, tried to sell her off.

"Hey, get your hands off her."

A group of beautiful boys appeared out of nowhere. They defeated the thugs at once and said incredible things to Lestia.

"It's nice to finally meet you, my sister."

Surprisingly, she was the daughter of the Duke of Verchester, a family which has produced wizards for generations. But it waas hard to believe those words without any proof.

"Come on, Lestia. Let's go home."

But did she want to hold on to any hope? She grabbed the boys' hands, a little impulsively.

---
Warmhearted Lestia has resigned herself to a life of misery under the thumb of her abusive uncle. However, right when things seem to take a turn for the worst, a mysterious boy claiming to be one of her four long-lost brothers appears in the nick of time to save her. After being whisked into a life of luxury, Lestia has her doubts about taking on the Verchester name. But after the discovery of her latent magical powers, Lestia starts to accept two strange truths: She is a true Verchester, and she has a destiny to fulfill.

---
**Original Novel:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/brother_a), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54007041), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6732895), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107084378)

description.id:
Restia kira, pamannya adalah satu-satunya keluarga yang dia punya. Namun, siapa sangka saat sang Paman hendak menjualnya untuk membayar utang, Restia justru diselamatkan oleh para pemuda yang mengaku sebagai kakaknya. Mengikuti mereka, Restia pun mulai mengetahui silsilah keluarga Berchester yang ternyata merupakan keluarga penyihir. Kata orang, keturunan Berchester pasti bisa menggunakan sihir, lalu bagaimana dengan Restia? Mampukah dia bertahan dan memantaskan dirinya sebagai Restia Berchester?

---
**Original Novel:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/brother_a), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54007041), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6732895), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107084378)

description.ko:
빈민가에서 술주정뱅이 삼촌 밑에서 자라며
꽃을 팔아 겨우 먹고 살아왔던 레스티아.

빛 때문에 폭력배들에게 협박당하던 삼촌이,
레스티아를 팔아버리려 하던 어느 날 밤.

“야,손치워”
어디선가 나타난 아름다운 소년들.
그들은 폭력배들을 단번에 물리치고

레스티아에게 믿을 수 없는 말을 건다.

“이제야 만나게 됐네, 내 동생.
우리는 네 오빠야.”

---
**Original Novel:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/brother_a), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54007041), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6732895), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107084378)
